data.text: @nzherald So they can't find any temporary workers with a forklift licence!! Try hiring some over 50's or 60's. I a sure there is a shitload of mature workers looking for work!!!!!
@OpinioVulgaris @nzherald You can get sick and choose not to test. Stay home, get better, and continue with life.
@nzherald I hope the cat food doesn't run out
@nzherald Well that's a shit deal unless they're guaranteed Australian wages.
@nzherald bullshit. why work in a supermarket in nz when they pay twice as much in aus
@nzherald How does this work? Are these kiwis retruning or are they paying them 1.5 x median wage?
